name: Big Pillow Quest
description:
Exploring the darkness and trying to find our way to comfort.

A prototype of game made for the Pencil Chisel Code #2 GameJam

User ASDW or arrows to move and Space bar to interract. Dont' play it in full screen mode with the Unity full screen blue button.

As a first game for us, it was a really great challenge.  Lots of new knowledge, a lot of fun and a rewarding experience !
